link.title: Enhance AI - Improve Writing, Coding & Marketing

meta.content: Using Artificial Intelligence tools to improve copywriting, coding and marketing, this powerful AI creates any content quick and easy to save you time & money.
meta.name: description

p.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.p: Now you can enhance everything you do with the latest AI tools to solve problems, write solutions and make life easier.

a.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

h1.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;
opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;
opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.div: Explain some code based on the syntax provided

ul.li: The code is a function definition.
It defines a new function called `HelloWorld` that takes a single argument called `text`
Prints out the value of `text` if it is defined, or `Hello World` if it is not defined.

h2.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

p.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.p: Start enhancing a range of tasks using AI, from writing emails, code, or blogs, to rephrasing paragraph‚Äôs you just want to reword!

div.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

h2.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

p.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.p: Predictive autocomplete sentences, with AI generated writing of introductions, keypoints, conclusions and more.

h2.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.h2: How do the AI tools work?

p.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.p: You might wonder how can AI assist you in daily activities. In many ways. Do you need something explained, or generated. See examples below!

div.div: No longer have trouble with code you can't debug. Try the code fixer before you jump onto StackOverflow.

ul.li: Fix coding issues like typos, missing closures, etc
Explain functions or syntax and how it works
Clean code that could be simplified or rewritten
Refactor programming functions to new standards
Create regular expressions that hard to code
Change languages from JavaScript to Python
Coming Soon: Write Code for me
Coming Soon: Get commands for bash, git or docker

img.div: Improve your own written content, with a number of content tools that allows you to do better copywriting, blogs and content.

ul.li: Grammar corrections fixing spelling, commas, etc
Rephrase sentences in different tones or language
Shorten long unwieldy paragraphs or sentences
Lengthen a short sentence with extra depth
Introduction to a blog or article quick and easy
Outlines like a listical to make writing content better.
Coming Soon: Enhance beta document writer

div.div: Every week we are expanding the tools available to assist you. From Job Ad generation to helping you generate YouTube Titles, there will be tools for all.

ul.li: Extract To-do tasks from an email or document
Raise Questions people might ask about a document
Explain something complicated like I'm 5 years old
Summarise the key points from a document
YouTube titles generated based on your topic
YouTube tags you should use for your topic
YouTube description or intro for your video
YouTube script outline in point form
YouTube comment respond quick and easy
Coming Soon: Facebook, Google, LinkedIn Ads
Coming Soon: Suggest your own!

h2.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

p.style: opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d;

div.p: Enhance AI was tested by developers in the community, on twitter, facebook and youtube and here is what they had to say!

div.blockquote: A very interesting and promising project for the future of coding and development.‚Äî Pam Ganguly (@pam_ganguly) August 30, 2021
It's a great project. I'm happy to share it with everyone I know on the Internet when it's released. üòâü§ì‚Äî Claudio Bernasconi (@CHBernasconiC) August 30, 2021
This is amazing ü§©‚Äî JSX Clan (@jsx_clan) August 30, 2021

Just went through the app, It is awesome üí´
You really did a great job :)‚Äî Suhail Kakar | JavaScript üíª (@SuhailKakar) August 30, 2021

This looks incredible Adrian üôå
Both feature wise and the design üëåüòç‚Äî Eddy Vinck (@EddyVinckk) August 30, 2021
Well this is truly a game changer ü§îüëç‚Äî Aleksandar Trifunovic (@alex_javadev) August 30, 2021

Wow, this is really great, I like the job description AI. and I really need to jump on the Tailwind bandwagon. Bootstrap is kicking me in the behind.‚Äî Chris Lane Jones (@cljwebdev) September 1, 2021
Nice one! Up and coming SaaS product for sure! üéâ‚Äî JavaScript Mastery (@jsmasterypro) August 30, 2021

div.p: Start enhancing a range of tasks using AI, from writing emails, code, or blogs, to rephrasing paragraph‚Äôs you just want to reword!

body.script: var typed = new Typed(".typed-header", { strings: ["explain code", "write blogs", "solve problems", "create articles"], typeSpeed: 125, backSpeed: 125, backDelay: 1500, startDelay: 500, loop: true, showCursor: true, cursorChar: "|", smartBackspace: true, attr: null, });
